projectTitle: How to correctly backup and encrypt directories
description: This short project is a basic setup I came up with to make encrypted backups on a schedule, how to manage the encryption keys, and lastly, send email notifications reporting status codes.
foodcloseto.me is an aggregator website that mines the yelp fusion API for restaurants in Austin, TX.
tools: Google Cloud Platform and then nginx self hosting, Gunicorn, Flask, SQL-Alchemy, Jinja2, Bootsrap, HTML, JS, CSS, Travis-CI, autopep8, coverage, pylint

description: The Robot Operating system library is a fantastic way to learn about robotics. But sometimes getting the hardware necessary to do so can be difficult. This is a research project for Cyber-Physical Systems in which I am producing a simulator that runs on the Kivy graphics library to simulate a f1/10 lidar-based automated vehicle . This allows for students study and program PID controllers without having to wait for a turn to use one of the 2 vehicles we have at UT. The code used in the simulator can be ported to the real vehicle.
